title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.4 - Designation of fiscal officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.4 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations

The director of personnel of the Division for Youth is
hereby designated as the fiscal officer responsible for certifying the payroll
of the Division for Youth for the purposes of this Part and in order to comply
with section
88
(1)(g)
of the Public Officers

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-2.4

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
